article.para: This example is from DocBook: The Definitive Guide. It isnâ€™t supposed to make a whole lot of sense in this context.

example.title: An example of a guiicon with an inlinemediaobject
example.para:
The exact text of the Legend and other labels on the graph is dependent upon the language of the current locale. Likewise, the text of the OK button and other buttons may vary. The
icon and the other icons on the left side of the display may be configured by the local administrator, but they are not generally expected to vary from locale to locale.
